channel.title: How do you...? - Needing help!

item.title: How do you...? - Needing help!
item.dc:creator: @chinny9 chinny9
item.description:
@chinny9 wrote:

Hi there.

I recently started coding a server, and at the moment, the EXP for a 99, is around 6,500,000. I am wanting to change this to 13,034,431. However, I do not have a clue where to change it.

If anyone knows how to, please reply!

EDIT:
I know the formulaâ€¦ What do I do to it, to be able to change the exp of a 99, from 6.5m to 13,034,431?

public int getLevelForXP(int exp) {
    int points = 0;
    int output = 0;

    for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= 99; lvl++) {
        points += Math.floor(
                (double) lvl + 150.0 * Math.pow(2.0, (double) lvl / 7.0));
        output = (int) Math.floor(points / 4);
        if (output >= exp) {
            return lvl;

Read full topic
